name: BetterPikin
description:
Your Country is in a serious recession and it's depending on collective effect of its citizens to get better. 

Your parents managed to train you through secondary school but the recession has affected their means of income and they are depending on you to work and help out. 

YOUR RESPONSIBILITY:

Gather some fruits from your parent's farm yard and sell them. Note: be careful of some obstacles there.

Good Luck
